name: RED to the past
description:
Year 2025. Communism has disappeared on Earth. The last loyal communist is hiding along with his dead spiritual leader. That communist is Razumovsky Egor Dmitrievich, a brilliant scientist who studies time travel. He plans to go back in time and save his ideology, going deeper and deeper into the past…

NOTE: Sometimes workers in the last zone get stuck and don’t really want to work in a communist society, just gently push them or throw your sickle at them to help them remember their true life purpose.

Thanks to the people who helped to bring communism to the Stone Age with their assets:

Raptor model: Sketchfab

Rex model: Sketchfab

Character models: Unreal Marketplace

Tropical Jungle pack: Unreal Marketplace

Misc sounds: Freesounds.org, Zapsplat.co
